MusicDB

  • database - Music DB Management
  • View page source

database - Music DB Management¶

This module manages the music database. Its main task is to add new albums or artist to the Music Database.

This command line interface expects three positional parameters. A subcommand, a target, and a path to the target: musicdb database $SUBCOMMAND $TARGET $PATH

The following subcommands are provided:

add:

Add new artist, album or song to the database. Direct interface to:

  • if target is song: mdbapi.database.MusicDBDatabase.AddSong()
  • if target is album: mdbapi.database.MusicDBDatabase.AddAlbum()
  • if target is artist: mdbapi.database.MusicDBDatabase.AddArtist()
update:
Update a song file via :mdbapi.database.MusicDBDatabase.UpdateSong()
getlyrics:
Search in song files for lyrics. This is done by calling for each song file mdbapi.database.MusicDBDatabase.AddLyricsFromFile()
check:
Check the given path if it is a valid artist, album or song path. This is done by calling mdbapi.database.MusicDBDatabase.TryAnalysePathFor().

Attention

While adding a new artist, album or song to the database, the file and directory attributes and ownerrship gets changed to the configured one in the MusicDB Configuration. And after adding the new data, a signal (USR1) gets send to the server to update its cache. Therefore, root permissions are necessary.

Examples

musicdb database add album /data/music/Artist/2000\ -\ New\ Album

Update an existing song

musicdb database update song /tmp/01\ newsong.flac /data/music/Artist/2000\ -\ Album/01\ oldsong.mp3
# only the song number must be identical!
